title: M7: Geometric properties of word embeddings
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: intermediate. * SUPERVISION: self-assessment. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 5 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: English. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: translate the words to the target language or find similar words that preserve the semantic (or syntactic in the case of planes-plane+person=people) relation between them. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: this question focuses on the geometric properties of word embeddings.
